project.name: desktop-util
project.author: Brandon Hale
project.description: The Desktop Utilities project manages a wide variety of small utilities and dockapps for the Gentoo Desktop.

longdescription.p: The Desktop Utilities project manages a wide variety of small utilities and dockapps for the Gentoo Desktop. Utilities include any small programs that make the desktop easier or more fun to use. Dockapps include similar programs that fit into the dock/slit/wharf of your desktop's wm.

goals.p: The goal of the WM project is to support all desktop utilities in Portage.

body.p: If you are experiencing a bug with a utility, we'd like to hear from you! Include all relevant information in your report to Gentoo's Bugzilla. Please include the output of "emerge info" and your version of X and the utility experiencing the problem.
